column2: In the back alleys of $CAPITAL$, rumours are beginning to spread.\n\nIt seems a bizarre cult worshipping ancient gods is expanding its ranks in secret.

The cultists in $COUNTRY$ are growing bolder and bolder.\n\nBefore, they tried to stay as hidden as possible, but now masked figures move openly in the street even in daylight, and ominous chanting can be heard all across $CAPITAL$ at night.
Why do I get a sense of impending doom?

There has been a significant change in $COUNTRY$.

Although the government and foreign policy still function as normal, it has become clear that at the highest levels, cultists of the old gods have seized control of major institutions.

In $CAPITAL$, the constant arguments between cultists and normal citizens is gone, replaced with a new unity of purpose.
Although the cult has seized control of $COUNTRY$, support of the cult is still hardly univeral outside $CAPITAL$.  However, we have ways of being persuasive when we need to be.
All shall know the horror of beyond.
Having unified vast swathes of humanity, the cultists centralized government are united in preparing for the next step.

The cult now stretches across the globe, but direct rule from the highest authority remains limited in places like $CAPITAL$.  We have generously decided to join our country into theirs, so that we can bring about our shared vision.
The road to our goal lies ahead.

Cultists from around the world have gathered in $CAPITAL$ to begin a ritual longer and more elaborate than any before.  Forming a prayer circle almost one hundred miles in diameter and filled with ancient and unholy artifacts from across the globe, the cultists clearly see their ultimate purpose as close at hand.
The cult has begun the ritual that will end the world.  Our country must now put aside the last vestiges of independence, and join them.

It seems that the unholy ritual of the cultists is making progress.  As of late, every horrid rite has accelerated, and given the rate of consumption of resources, the ritual could not possibly be more than about 15 years from completion.  Our intelligence has determined that they are attempting to awaken the great old one Cthulhu, whose arrival will end civilized society across the world.

The event humanity has been dreading for eons is upon us!

The cultists have preformed one final burst, and channeled enough energy to awaken Cthulhu, the great old one!

It will not be long before he leads the cultists to their final domination of the Earth.

The prophesied end of the world is here!
The cultist government in $COUNTRY$ eagerly surrenders to their master.

The night we've been fearing for almost a century has arrived.

Cthulhu and its followers have begun eliminating the last significant resistance to their rule: $COUNTRY$.  This is the apocalypse we have feared so long.

A white peace is not possible, this is a battle to the death.
Despite our negotiated ceasefire, Cthulhu still seeks to wipe us out.  This war will not end until one side achieves total victory.

Over the last few days, the usually singleminded enemy armies have descended into petty squabbles and apathy.

It seems that our victory over its legions have caused Cthulhu to abandon Earth.

Many cultist leaders have committed suicide, and the remaining human cultist leadership is trying to organize a massive nation with no supernatural assistance, and little social cohesion.  Over the next few years, we anticipate the cult's domain to fall apart and split into feuding nations, as it should be.

We have done it.  We have saved the world.
It is time to crush the last bit of resistance on this planet.  $FROMCOUNTRY$ will fall.
With no supernatural assistance, and no unifying purpose, $COUNTRY$ is falling apart.
Resistance to the cultists' rule has resulted in the independence of $COUNTRY$
The end is nigh! Time for the cultists' to unite!
The end times surely approaches!\n\nThe Deep Ones openly walk the shores preparing for when Dagon rises from the depths!
The end times approach nigh!\n\nThe venomous serpent people have come out of hiding and are working towards the return of the snake god Yig!
It begins! The revolution of the cultists' in $COUNTRY$ shows the way to the future! Unite!
Cultists are known to operate here
Cultists are becoming a significant institution here
This country is run by cultists!
The cultist's numbers grow ever larger...
We are united in one vision
We have started the ritual that will bring about Cthulhu
The great old one Cthulhu is here and leading us to the world's end!
We fight not just for our survival, but for the survival of our world.
Our people feel as though our country has no reason to exist.
